name: Blaster Gear
description: Enter your fighter "Volt Gear" and return to Earth to reclaim it from the forces of the Oracle, a radical force that has taken over the world and plans to erase all life that resides there. You must use the evolution system named Advent to destroy the enemy forces. This will not be an easy task, however, for opponents with immense strength will stop at nothing to shoot you down. Are you ready to shoot em' up?
